Package com.example.softwaresolutionssquad.controllers

Class MakeFilterController

java.lang.Object
com.example.softwaresolutionssquad.controllers.MakeFilterController
public class MakeFilterController extends Object
Controller class for managing filter operations based on the make of inventory items.

  • Constructor Details

    • MakeFilterController

      public MakeFilterController(android.content.Context context, android.widget.TextView estimatedValue, android.widget.TextView makesTextView, android.widget.LinearLayout makeFilter, android.widget.TextView keywordButton, android.widget.TextView dateButton, android.widget.TextView makeButton, android.widget.TextView tagButton, InventoryListAdapter inventoryListAdapter, android.widget.ListView inventoryListView, ArrayList<InventoryItem> inventoryItems, SortController sortController)
      Constructs a MakeFilterController.
      Parameters:
      context - The current context.
      makesTextView - The text view to display selected makes.
      makeFilter - The layout containing the make filter controls.
      keywordButton - The button for keyword filtering.
      dateButton - The button for date filtering.
      makeButton - The button for make filtering.
      tagButton - The button for tag filtering.
      inventoryListAdapter - The adapter for the inventory list view.
      inventoryListView - The list view for displaying inventory items.
      inventoryItems - The list of inventory items.

      Toggles the visibility of the make filter layout.

    • filteredResults

      public void filteredResults(Predicate<InventoryItem> condition)
      Filters the results based on the specified condition and updates the list view.
      Parameters:
      condition - The predicate to apply as the filter condition.
